title: How should I complete the class 11th syllabus in 4 months? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi! You have three months to prepare for your final examination which is more than enough. But you will have to manage your time efficiently and have to be completely dedicated to your studies then only the coming three months could help you. Along with time management, make a daily routine of all the subjects and plan out which all topics you'd be covering and in what order. This would give you clarity as to how you should be completing your syllabus. Follow your routine, once you've finished your syllabus once, go through it again for revision and make notes. Try maintaining notes of everything that you study. Also, don't study 24*7. Give yourself a leisure break wherein you can do activities that are not related to study because you have to rest your mind as well. Don't stress over it too much, you'll be able to complete your syllabus in time.  P.s.- If you're looking to buy any of the Class XI textbooks then check out MyPustak from where you can get them for the cheapest price delivered to your home. Hope I answered your question. All the best for your examination.
